/usr/local/cuda-10.0/bin/nvcc    -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/driver.dir/src/test-filter.cu.o CMakeFiles/driver.dir/src/driver.cu.o CMakeFiles/driver.dir/src/GLViewer.cpp.o CMakeFiles/driver.dir/src/common.cu.o -o CMakeFiles/driver.dir/cmake_device_link.o  -L/usr/local/lib  -L/usr/local/zed/lib  -L/usr/local/cuda-10.0/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs  -L/usr/local/cuda-10.0/targets/x86_64-linux/lib
